issues.title: Log in with Google/Facebook
issues.description: A user is able to log in with his pre-existing Google or Facebook account

issues.title: Create user account
issues.description: A user can create a personal account

issues.title: Delete user account
issues.description: A user can delete his personal account

issues.title: Add OAuth
issues.description: When authenticating users OAuth should be used

issues.title: Configure SSL
issues.description: Enable https and redirect all http traffic to https

categories.name: Could-Have
categories.description: Requirements labelled as Could have are desirable but not necessary and could improve the user experience or customer satisfaction for a little development cost.

categories.name: Should-Have
categories.description: Requirements labelled as Should have are important but not necessary for delivery in the current delivery timebox.

categories.name: Must-Have
categories.description: Requirements labelled as Must have are critical to the current delivery timebox in order for it to be a success.
